name: 曾乙文
objective:
本課程旨在瞭解設計的要素與美的形式原理，應用各種媒材的特性與構成，從平面及立體的構成的實作練習中，激發出設計美感與
創造力。透過「使用者 — 產品 — 環境」三者間互動關係的深入探討，掌握住視覺傳達、推測設計應用與多媒體的基本語彙，作為互動設計的基礎，創造出全新的體驗與感受。This course aims to explore the principles of design elements and the aesthetics of form, applying the characteristics and composition of various materials. Through practical exercises in both two-dimensional and three-dimensional compositions, it seeks to inspire design aesthetics and creativity. By delving into the interactive relationships among “user—product—environment,” students will grasp the fundamental vocabulary of visual communication, speculative design applications, and multimedia as a foundation for interaction design, ultimately creating novel experiences and sensations.

name: 楊宙航
objective:
以專題研究方式訓練學生獨立企劃，分析，評斷，歸納及創新思考的能力。並藉由對視覺美學，媒體技術，媒體機能相關性等問題之深入探討，實際演練媒體設計之過程及熟練媒體設計之技巧.
Studio in media design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced media and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.
